title: [Health] A large UK study has provided reassurance that taking hormone replacement therapy to relieve menopausal symptoms doesnâ€™t increase the risk of dying early, and may even be slightly protective

[Cancer] Half of top cancer studies fail high-profile reproducibility effort. Researchers with the Reproducibility Project: Cancer Biology aimed to replicate 193 experiments from 53 top cancer papers published from 2010 to 2012. But only a quarter of those experiments were able to be reproduced.
